member.summary: Converts the string representation of a date and time to its DateTime equivalent by using the conventions of the current thread culture.

member.name: M:Unfix.IDateTimeAdapter.Parse(System.String,System.IFormatProvider,System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles)
member.summary: Converts the string representation of a date and time to its DateTime equivalent by using culture-specific format information from the and a formatting style.

member.name: M:Unfix.IDateTimeAdapter.ParseExact(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String},System.IFormatProvider,System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles)
member.summary: Converts the specified string representation of a date and time to its DateTime equivalent using the specified , culture-specific format information from the , and style. The format of the string representation must match at least one of the specified formats exactly or an exception is thrown.

member.summary: Converts the specified string representation of a date and time to its DateTime equivalent using the specified format and culture-specific format information. The format of the string representation must match the specified format exactly.

member.summary: Creates a new object that has the same number of ticks as the specified , but is designated as either local time, Coordinated Universal Time (UTC), or neither, as indicated by the specified value.
